citations.narrative:
Registrant is exhibiting and selling animals at the Friendship Flea Market. In the event of a disease outbreak, animals
need be traced to assure optimal animal welfare. A broker's license is necessary to ensure animals can be traced and
welfare requirements are met. Obtain a broker's license to exhibit/sell regulated animals.
Correct by: June 17, 2021 from this day forward
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Registrant.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
Registrant is exhibiting and selling animals at the Friendship Flea Market.  In the event of a disease outbreak, animals 
need be traced to assure optimal animal welfare.  A broker's license is necessary to ensure animals can be traced and 
welfare requirements are met.  Obtain a broker's license to exhibit/sell regulated animals. 
 
Correct by:  June 17, 2021 from this day forward 
 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Registrant. 
 
End Section
